properties.description: Ce data flow permet d'alimenter dynamiquement une table ODS / ADM à partir d'une table STG, en ajout / modif ou en ajout / modif / suppression logique

sources.name: Source
sources.description: Ces données vont être préfixées par SRC_ dans le flux de données

sources.name: Destination
sources.description: Ces données vont être préfixées par DST_ dans le flux de données

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	IdSuiviPackage as integer (1),
	TableSource as string ('Adm.RefCatLtbStgVersAdm'),
	TableDestination as string ('adm.RefCatLtb'),
	ColonnesClef as string ('CodeHierarchie,CodeLtb'),
	ActiverSuppressions as boolean (true()),
	FiltreSqlSources as string ('')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Source
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Destination
PrefixeSRC, PrefixeDST join(SRC_ControleClef == DST_ControleClef,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join
DerivedColumn1 split(!isNull(MotifRejet),
	isNull(DST_Controle),
	isNull(SRC_Controle) && $ActiverSuppressions,
	SRC_Controle != DST_Controle && !isNull(SRC_Controle),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Rejet, Insertion, Suppression, Modification)
SelectInsertion derive(Supprime = false(),
		DateModification = DateCreation,
		UtilisateurModification = UtilisateurCreation) ~> EstAjout
SelectModification derive(Supprime = false(),
		UtilisateurModification = 'FLUX') ~> EstModification
SelectSuppression derive(Supprime = true(),
		UtilisateurModification = 'FLUX') ~> EstSuppression
Join derive(DateActuelle = currentTimestamp(),
		IdSuiviPackage = $IdSuiviPackage,
		MotifRejet = byName('SRC_MotifRejet'),
		UtilisateurFlux = 'FLUX') ~> DerivedColumn1
Source derive(ControleClef = sha1(byNames(split($ColonnesClef,','))),
		Controle = byName('Controle')) ~> HashClefSource
Destination derive(ControleClef = sha1(byNames(split($ColonnesClef,','))),
		Controle = byName('Controle')) ~> HashClefDestination
ConditionalSplit1@Rejet select(mapColumn(
		IdSuiviPackage,
		DateRejet = DateActuelle,
		MotifRejet,
		each(match(endsWith(name,"Src")&&startsWith(name,'SRC_')),
			substring($$,5,length($$)-7) = $$),
		each(match(name=='SRC_Controle'),
			'Controle' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRejet
ConditionalSplit1@Insertion select(mapColumn(
		IdSuiviPackage,
		DateCreation = DateActuelle,
		UtilisateurCreation = UtilisateurFlux,
		each(match(in(split($ColonnesClef,','),replace(name,'SRC_',''))),
			replace($$,'SRC_','') = $$),
		each(match(startsWith(name,"SRC_")&&!in(split($ColonnesClef,','),replace(name,'SRC_',''))&&!endsWith(name,'Src')&&!in(['SRC_MotifRejet','SRC_dateOperation','SRC_DateOperation','SRC_Controle','SRC_ControleClef'],name)),
			replace($$,'SRC_','') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInsertion
HashClefSource select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			'SRC_'+$$ = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PrefixeSRC
HashClefDestination select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			'DST_'+$$ = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PrefixeDST
ConditionalSplit1@Suppression select(mapColumn(
		IdSuiviPackage,
		DateModification = DateActuelle,
		each(match(in(split($ColonnesClef,','),replace(name,'DST_',''))),
			replace($$,'DST_','') = $$),
		each(match(startsWith(name,"DST_")&&!in(split($ColonnesClef,','),replace(name,'DST_',''))),
			replace($$,'DST_','') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSuppression
ConditionalSplit1@Modification select(mapColumn(
		IdSuiviPackage,
		DateModification = DateActuelle,
		each(match(in(split($ColonnesClef,','),replace(name,'SRC_',''))),
			replace($$,'SRC_','') = $$),
		each(match(startsWith(name,"SRC_")&&!in(split($ColonnesClef,','),replace(name,'SRC_',''))&&!endsWith(name,'Src')&&!in(['SRC_MotifRejet','SRC_dateOperation','SRC_DateOperation','SRC_Controle','SRC_ControleClef'],name)),
			replace($$,'SRC_','') = $$),
		each(match(name=='DST_DateCreation'),
			'DateCreation' = $$),
		each(match(name=='DST_UtilisateurCreation'),
			'UtilisateurCreation' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectModification
SuppressionControle alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> Update
EstSuppression, EstModification union(byName: true)~> UnionModification
EstAjout alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> Insert
UnionModification select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name!='Controle'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SuppressionControle
SelectRejet sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 3,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkRejet
Insert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkInsertion
Update sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:(split($ColonnesClef,',')),
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkModification
